advisory.name: RLBA-2022:7125
advisory.synopsis: virt-who bug fix and enhancement update
advisory.topic: An update for virt-who is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
advisory.description: The virt-who service collects information about the connection between the hypervisor and its virtual guests that are present in the system and provides the subscription manager with a mapping file containing the hypervisor-guest pairs. The service periodically queries the hypervisor to report its guests and changes the mapping file accordingly, making sure that the information stored in the subscription manager is accurate.

fixes.description: virt-who reporting always the same VM's when using with Nutanix Prism Central [rhel-8.6.0.z]
